name: Hydra Bridged USDC (Hydra)
description: Hydra Bridged USDC (Hydra) is a bridged form of USDC on Ethereum, that was bridged from the Ethereum blockchain via the Hydra Bridge to Hydra Chain. The Hydra Bridge connects the Hydra Chain Blockchain with the Ethereum Blockchain, enabling seamless transfers of the USDC stablecoin between the two networks. It allows users to move USDC from Ethereum to Hydra Chain and vice versa, enabling faster and cheaper transactions on the Hydra Chain Blockchain.
